location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1622 of 1866 from Charles Gonne, Secretary to Government, Bombay to the Political Resident Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing letters in Arabic for the Muskat [Muscat] envoys and including English translations for Pelly's information. The letter also asks Pelly to inform British Subjects of the Government's decision with regards to trading in the Gulf and to despatch a Native Agent to Muskat.The enclosed letters are not included.
